title: TVS Motor inches closer to Ola in E2W market as iQube becomes more popular
description: TVS Motor Co. is closing the retail market share gap with Ola Electric in the two-wheeler e-vehicle sector with 19.5% to Ola's 24.8% according to Vahan vehicle registration. This follows Ola's drop in volume share growth, prompting a price reduction on its S1 Pro electric scooter. TVS' electric scooter iQube, which now makes up 5% of its total two-wheeler wholesale volume, has increased in popularity. There is potential for improvement with e-2W penetration increasing 260 basis points from the previous year to 4.5% in FY23.
